sentences.en: Description: casters splint type: EF - 1000 B color: black application: used for casters installation.

sentences.en: Figure 5 - 2 : Leg splint for lower limb fracture.
sentences.cn: 图5-2:用于下肢骨折的脚托支架.

sentences.en: He a splint for the broken leg.
sentences.cn: 他给骨折的腿制作了一副夹板.

sentences.en: He lit the fire with a burning splint.
sentences.cn: 他用一根烧着的木条点火.

sentences.en: Ice it for 45 minutes, then splint it.
sentences.cn: 用冰敷45分钟, 然后用夹板固定.

sentences.en: Lie down, please. Let me take off the splint.
sentences.cn: 请躺下, 让我去掉夹板.

sentences.en: Methods : Using cotton cloth, nylon joint, splint, wrist - band, the fixation band was made.
sentences.cn: 方法用白棉布 、 尼龙搭扣 、 夹板 、 护腕制成中单式固定带.

sentences.en: Product has wood door luxury, composite door, door splint .
sentences.cn: 产品有实木豪华门、 复合门、 夹板门。

sentences.en: Product has wood door luxury, composite door, door splint.
sentences.cn: 产品有实木豪华门 、 复合门 、 夹板门.

sentences.en: SCULLY: I'm going to make you a splint, Gibson, okay?
sentences.cn: 史高丽: 我会给你用夹板, 吉普森, 好不好?

sentences.en: She wore a metal splint on one leg.
sentences.cn: 她的一条腿上上了金属夹板.

sentences.en: Should adjust the spacing so that the splint splint can clamp back.
sentences.cn: 对此应调整夹板间距,使夹板能夹紧书背.

sentences.en: Side splint registration method to keep the print block time are in the correct location.
sentences.cn: 不正夹不活套准办法可以保留丝网版屡屡都位于台面不差的场所.

sentences.en: With an annual output of plastic hangers , racks splint number 10000000.
sentences.cn: 年产塑料衣架 、 夹板衣架数千万只.

sentences.en: Your middle phalanx are broken and I will splint it.
sentences.cn: 你的中指骨断了,我要把它用夹板固定好.
